attributes.action: Radically change the production of single use plastic to hemp based plastic
attributes.additional_details:
https://canex.co.uk/the-uses-of-hemp-hemp-plastics/

Climate change: Big lifestyle changes 'needed to cut emissions' https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-49499521
attributes.background: We clearly have a climate emergency. Single use plastic is filling our oceans and destroying our planet as we know it. The UK should be leading the pack when is comes to promoting a sustainable planet. Hemp plastic has been proven as a biodegradable form of plastic.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for manufacturers. 

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259176
